name: Zombies Finger Fight
description:
How to survive in a zombies invasion? Keep you finger flexible!
This is a unique zombies game: Draw on screen to destroy those walking dead!
Feature:
- Gesture Play: Each Zombie has a symbol. Draw it on screen with your fingers to kill it.
- 5 elements power: You can lure them in, burn them up or even... make them dance
- Boss fight: a bonus mini game with different game play
- 3 modes for your taste: Easy, Hard and Inferno
- Waves after waves, it's infinite
- Leader board and Achievements
